data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used for a comparison of the occurrence of macrovascular disease and risk factors (e.g. cerebro-vascular disease, coronary arterial disease, peripheral vascular disease, death) in DCCT volunteers randomized to the standard versus those randomized to the experimental group (for published results see <a href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/7732997?ordinalpos=2&itool=EntrezSystem2.PEntrez.Pubmed.Pubmed_ResultsPanel.Pubmed_DefaultReportPanel.Pubmed_RVDocSum"> PMID 7732997</a>). Average follow-up time was 6.5 years. (1) Detailed Record of macrovascular events (see also: (2) Repeated measures of putative risk factors, pht000257, ms5event)
